entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:10 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -14.5°C

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
